AddShardingNode.title: AddShardingNode
AddShardingNode.summary: Adds one or more data shards to an ApsaraDB for Redis cluster instance.

AllocateDirectConnection.title: AllocateDirectConnection
AllocateDirectConnection.summary: Applies for a private endpoint for an ApsaraDB for Redis cluster instance.

AllocateInstancePublicConnection.title: AllocateInstancePublicConnection
AllocateInstancePublicConnection.summary: Applies for a public endpoint for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.title: CheckCloudResourceAuthorized
CheckCloudResourceAuthorized.summary: Queries whether an ApsaraDB for Redis instance is authorized to use Key Management Service (KMS).

CreateAccount.title: CreateAccount
CreateAccount.summary: Creates an account that has specific permissions for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

CreateBackup.title: CreateBackup
CreateBackup.summary: Backs up an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

CreateCacheAnalysisTask.title: CreateCacheAnalysisTask
CreateCacheAnalysisTask.summary: Manually creates a cache analysis task.

CreateGlobalDistributeCache.title: CreateGlobalDistributeCache
CreateGlobalDistributeCache.summary: Converts an existing ApsaraDB for Redis instance to the first child instance of a distributed ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

CreateInstance.title: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.summary: Creates an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

CreateInstances.title: CreateInstances
CreateInstances.summary: Creates multiple ApsaraDB for Redis instances at a time.

DeleteAccount.title: DeleteAccount
DeleteAccount.summary: Deletes an account from an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup
DeleteGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Deletes a global IP whitelist template.

DeleteShardingNode.title: DeleteShardingNode
DeleteShardingNode.summary: Removes one or more data shards from an ApsaraDB for Redis cluster instance.

DescribeAccounts.title: DescribeAccounts
DescribeAccounts.summary: Queries all accounts or a specified account of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeAuditLogConfig.title: DescribeAuditLogConfig
DescribeAuditLogConfig.summary: Queries the audit log configurations of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. The configurations include whether the audit log feature is enabled and the retention period of audit logs.

DescribeAuditRecords.title: DescribeAuditRecords
DescribeAuditRecords.summary: Queries the audit logs of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeAvailableResource.title: DescribeAvailableResource
DescribeAvailableResource.summary: Queries the types of ApsaraDB for Redis instances that can be created in a specified zone.

DescribeBackupPolicy.title: DescribeBackupPolicy
DescribeBackupPolicy.summary: Queries the backup policy of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance, including the backup cycle and backup time.

DescribeBackupTasks.title: DescribeBackupTasks
DescribeBackupTasks.summary: Queries the states of backup tasks for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeBackups.title: DescribeBackups
DescribeBackups.summary: Queries the backup files of the ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeCacheAnalysisReport.title: DescribeCacheAnalysisReport
DescribeCacheAnalysisReport.summary: Queries the cache analytics report that is generated on a specified date for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeCacheAnalysisReportList.title: DescribeCacheAnalysisReportList
DescribeCacheAnalysisReportList.summary: Queries the cache analytics reports of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeClusterBackupList.summary: 获取备份服务化实例的集群备份集。

DescribeClusterMemberInfo.title: DescribeClusterMemberInfo
DescribeClusterMemberInfo.summary: Queries the configuration information of nodes in an ApsaraDB for Redis cluster instance, such as the specifications and the maximum number of connections.

DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.title: DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo
DescribeDBInstanceNetInfo.summary: Queries the network information of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeDBNodeDirectVipInfo.title: DescribeDBNodeDirectVipInfo
DescribeDBNodeDirectVipInfo.summary: Queries the information about virtual IP addresses (VIPs) of child instances of a cluster instance in direct connection mode.

DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceList.title: DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceList
DescribeDedicatedClusterInstanceList.summary: Queries the information of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance deployed in a dedicated cluster.

DescribeEncryptionKey.title: DescribeEncryptionKey
DescribeEncryptionKey.summary: Queries the details of a Transparent Data Encryption (TDE) custom key for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeEncryptionKeyList.title: DescribeEncryptionKeyList
DescribeEncryptionKeyList.summary: Queries the custom keys used by an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeEngineVersion.title: DescribeEngineVersion
DescribeEngineVersion.summary: Queries the major version and minor version of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance and the release notes for minor versions.

DescribeGlobalDistributeCache.title: DescribeGlobalDistributeCache
DescribeGlobalDistributeCache.summary: Queries the details of a distributed ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
DescribeGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Queries information about the global IP whitelist templates associated with an instance.

DescribeHistoryMonitorValues.title: DescribeHistoryMonitorValues
DescribeHistoryMonitorValues.summary: Queries the performance monitoring data of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeInstanceAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAttribute
DescribeInstanceAttribute.summary: Queries the details of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
DescribeInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: Queries whether auto-renewal is enabled for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeInstanceConfig.title: DescribeInstanceConfig
DescribeInstanceConfig.summary: Queries the parameter settings of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeInstanceSSL.title: DescribeInstanceSSL
DescribeInstanceSSL.summary: Queries whether TLS (SSL) encryption is enabled for an instance.

DescribeInstanceTDEStatus.title: DescribeInstanceTDEStatus
DescribeInstanceTDEStatus.summary: Queries whether transparent data encryption (TDE) is enabled for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeInstances.title: DescribeInstances
DescribeInstances.summary: Queries the information about one or more ApsaraDB for Redis instances.

DescribeInstancesOverview.title: DescribeInstancesOverview
DescribeInstancesOverview.summary: Queries the overview information of one or more ApsaraDB for Redis instances.

DescribeIntranetAttribute.title: DescribeIntranetAttribute
DescribeIntranetAttribute.summary: Queries the internal bandwidth of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. If you have purchased extra internal bandwidth, the expiration time of the purchased bandwidth is also returned.

DescribeLogicInstanceTopology.title: DescribeLogicInstanceTopology
DescribeLogicInstanceTopology.summary: Queries the logical topology of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeMonitorItems.title: DescribeMonitorItems
DescribeMonitorItems.summary: Queries the metrics of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeParameterModificationHistory.title: DescribeParameterModificationHistory
DescribeParameterModificationHistory.summary: Queries the parameter modification history of a Tair or ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeParameterTemplates.title: DescribeParameterTemplates
DescribeParameterTemplates.summary: Queries the parameters and their default values that are supported by ApsaraDB for Redis instances of different architectures and major versions.

DescribeParameters.title: DescribeParameters
DescribeParameters.summary: Queries the configuration parameters and running parameters of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribePrice.title: DescribePrice
DescribePrice.summary: Queries the fees that you must pay when you create, upgrade, or renew an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions in which ApsaraDB for Redis instances can be created.

DescribeRoleZoneInfo.title: DescribeRoleZoneInfo
DescribeRoleZoneInfo.summary: The default bandwidth of the node. Unit: MB/s.

DescribeRunningLogRecords.title: DescribeRunningLogRecords
DescribeRunningLogRecords.summary: Queries the active logs of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.title: DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration
DescribeSecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: Queries the security groups that are added to the whitelists of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeSecurityIps.title: DescribeSecurityIps
DescribeSecurityIps.summary: Queries the IP address whitelists of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

DescribeSlowLogRecords.title: DescribeSlowLogRecords
DescribeSlowLogRecords.summary: Queries the slow logs of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance that are generated within a specified period of time.

DescribeTasks.title: DescribeTasks
DescribeTasks.summary: Queries all tasks that are performed on an ApsaraDB for Redis instance within a specified period of time.

DescribeZones.title: DescribeZones
DescribeZones.summary: Queries the zones available for ApsaraDB for Redis.

EnableAdditionalBandwidth.title: EnableAdditionalBandwidth
EnableAdditionalBandwidth.summary: Adjusts the bandwidth of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

FlushExpireKeys.title: FlushExpireKeys
FlushExpireKeys.summary: Deletes the expired keys from an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

FlushInstance.title: FlushInstance
FlushInstance.summary: Clears the data of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. The cleared data cannot be restored.

FlushInstanceForDB.title: FlushInstanceForDB
FlushInstanceForDB.summary: Cleans the data of specified databases in an instance.

GrantAccountPrivilege.title: GrantAccountPrivilege
GrantAccountPrivilege.summary: Modifies the permissions of an account for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

InitializeKvstorePermission.title: InitializeKvstorePermission
InitializeKvstorePermission.summary: Assigns a service-linked role to ApsaraDB for Redis.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the relationships between ApsaraDB for Redis instances and tags.

LockDBInstanceWrite.title: LockDBInstanceWrite
LockDBInstanceWrite.summary: Places a write lock on an instance. After the instance is locked, it supports only read operations.

MigrateToOtherZone.title: MigrateToOtherZone
MigrateToOtherZone.summary: Migrates an ApsaraDB for Redis instance to another zone in the same region.

ModifyAccountDescription.title: ModifyAccountDescription
ModifyAccountDescription.summary: Modifies the description of an account for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyAccountPassword.title: ModifyAccountPassword
ModifyAccountPassword.summary: Changes the password of a specific account for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyActiveOperationTask.title: ModifyActiveOperationTask
ModifyActiveOperationTask.summary: Changes the scheduled switchover time of an O\\\&M task.

ModifyAuditLogConfig.title: ModifyAuditLogConfig
ModifyAuditLogConfig.summary: Modifies the audit log settings of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyBackupPolicy.title: ModifyBackupPolicy
ModifyBackupPolicy.summary: Modifies the automatic backup policy of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.title: ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString
ModifyDBInstanceConnectionString.summary: Changes the endpoint or port number of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroup.summary: Modifies a global IP whitelist template.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupName.summary: Modifies the name of a global IP whitelist template.

ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.title: ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation
ModifyGlobalSecurityIPGroupRelation.summary: Adds a specified instance to a specified IP whitelist template.

ModifyInstanceAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAttribute
ModifyInstanceAttribute.summary: Changes the information of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance, such as the name and password.

ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.title: ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute
ModifyInstanceAutoRenewalAttribute.summary: Enables or disables auto-renewal for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyInstanceConfig.title: ModifyInstanceConfig
ModifyInstanceConfig.summary: Modifies the parameter settings of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyInstanceMaintainTime.title: ModifyInstanceMaintainTime
ModifyInstanceMaintainTime.summary: Modifies the maintenance window of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. Alibaba Cloud maintains ApsaraDB for Redis instances during the specified maintenance window.

ModifyInstanceMajorVersion.title: ModifyInstanceMajorVersion
ModifyInstanceMajorVersion.summary: Upgrades the major version of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyInstanceMinorVersion.title: ModifyInstanceMinorVersion
ModifyInstanceMinorVersion.summary: Updates the minor version of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyInstanceNetExpireTime.title: ModifyInstanceNetExpireTime
ModifyInstanceNetExpireTime.summary: Extends the retention period of the classic network endpoint of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. You can call this operation after you change the network type of the ApsaraDB for Redis instance from classic network to Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) with the classic network endpoint retained.

ModifyInstanceParameter.title: 应用参数模板到实例
ModifyInstanceParameter.summary: Applies a parameter template to a specified instance.

ModifyInstanceSSL.title: ModifyInstanceSSL
ModifyInstanceSSL.summary: Modifies the SSL settings of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyInstanceSpec.title: ModifyInstanceSpec
ModifyInstanceSpec.summary: Changes the specifications of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifyInstanceTDE.title: ModifyInstanceTDE
ModifyInstanceTDE.summary: Enables transparent data encryption (TDE) for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. You can use existing custom keys.

ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode.title: ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode
ModifyInstanceVpcAuthMode.summary: Enables or disables password-free access for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. This way, you can connect to a database in a convenient and secure manner.

ModifyIntranetAttribute.title: ModifyIntranetAttribute
ModifyIntranetAttribute.summary: Temporarily adjusts the internal bandwidth of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance that is deployed in a dedicated cluster.

ModifyResourceGroup.title: ModifyResourceGroup
ModifyResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which an ApsaraDB for Redis instance belongs.

ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.title: ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration
ModifySecurityGroupConfiguration.summary: Resets the security groups that are added to the whitelists of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ModifySecurityIps.title: ModifySecurityIps
ModifySecurityIps.summary: Modifies the IP address whitelists of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ReleaseDirectConnection.title: ReleaseDirectConnection
ReleaseDirectConnection.summary: Releases the private endpoint of an ApsaraDB for Redis cluster instance.

ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.title: ReleaseInstancePublicConnection
ReleaseInstancePublicConnection.summary: Releases the public endpoint of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

RemoveSubInstance.title: RemoveSubInstance
RemoveSubInstance.summary: Removes a child instance from a distributed instance.

RenewAdditionalBandwidth.title: RenewAdditionalBandwidth
RenewAdditionalBandwidth.summary: Renews the purchased bandwidth for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

RenewInstance.title: RenewInstance
RenewInstance.summary: Renews an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

ResetAccountPassword.title: ResetAccountPassword
ResetAccountPassword.summary: Resets the password of an account for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

RestartInstance.title: RestartInstance
RestartInstance.summary: Restarts a running ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

RestoreInstance.title: RestoreInstance
RestoreInstance.summary: Restores the data in a backup file to a specified ApsaraDB for Redis instance.

SwitchInstanceHA.title: SwitchInstanceHA
SwitchInstanceHA.summary: Performs a master-replica switchover to switch node roles. This operation is applicable to disaster recovery drills and nearby access to applications that are deployed across zones.

SwitchInstanceProxy.title: SwitchInstanceProxy
SwitchInstanceProxy.summary: Enables or disables the proxy mode for an ApsaraDB for Redis cluster instance in a dedicated cluster.

SwitchNetwork.title: SwitchNetwork
SwitchNetwork.summary: Changes the virtual private cloud (VPC) or vSwitch of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance. If the instance is deployed in the classic network, the network type of the instance is changed from the classic network to VPC.

SyncDtsStatus.title: SyncDtsStatus
SyncDtsStatus.summary: Disables configuration changes for an ApsaraDB for Redis instance before you use Data Transmission Service (DTS) to migrate or synchronize data of the instance. This prevents migration and synchronization task failures due to the configuration change.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds specified tags to one or more ApsaraDB for Redis instances.

TransformInstanceChargeType.title: TransformInstanceChargeType
TransformInstanceChargeType.summary: Changes the billing method of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance from subscription to pay-as-you-go or from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

TransformToPrePaid.title: TransformToPrePaid
TransformToPrePaid.summary: Changes the billing method of an ApsaraDB for Redis instance from pay-as-you-go to subscription.

UnlockDBInstanceWrite.title: UnlockDBInstanceWrite
UnlockDBInstanceWrite.summary: Removes the write lock from an instance. After the instance is unlocked, it supports both read and write operations.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from one or more ApsaraDB for Redis instances.
